select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from game_toy
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT DISTINCT toy_type FROM game_toy WHERE bind_uid = #{bindUid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and bind_status = 3
SELECT * FROM game_toy ORDER BY toy_code DESC
